title: If it's ok to penalize us for losing a 4v5 can we get a bonus for winning one?
body: Because I had a Riven just now who fed 2 kills in 4 minutes and ragequit, and we pulled off a stunning victory that should be worth more than the usual 20 LP as far as I'm concerned.

replies.body: Yeah actually I agree this would be a nice reward
Riot wants to _reduce_ AFKing. Why would they implement a reward for it?
That's not rewarding AFKing but compensation for people who deal with an AFKer on their team.

> [{quoted}](name=7ckngMad,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=BQhawFlv,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2019-04-02T19:56:10.433+0000)
>
> That's not rewarding AFKing but compensation for people who deal with an AFKer on their team.

"It's not six, it's half a dozen!"

If a win with an AFK grants extra LP, some people will try to get what they consider their lower-performing teammates to leave. "You're 0/2 while the rest of us are fed. Why should we carry you? If you don't AFK, you're costing me LP, so leave or I'll report you."

AFK compensation of various types is suggested here on Boards just about every other day, and it's a bad idea every time.

i agree with the idea of the afk person eating all of the teams lp loss if they are afk for over 25% of the game. make it were the afk person gose negative lp as well. dont demote a full rank. however make them climb of out the hole they caused for the other players on the team. if the team despite the afk person they get +10 lp on top of the lp for winning one time per day  limit.this would limit abuse quite a bit. since most people are in iron  and bronze riot  will do nothing. since they only care about the pro and semi pro players. despite the claim they want all of us to have fun and not have our games ruined as well. on a second offense ban them from ranked for 7 days. ranked ban only so they can play normals but not ranked. on a 3rd offense its a 14 day ranked ban on top of the loss of the lp of the teammates.  if a person hits 4 afks they get 30 ban from the game.  after 3 chances to not ruin games people have to realize they are important to their team. after the 30 ban its a probationary 30 day period of damn near zero tolerance. when i say 30 days i mean 30 days of games played pvp. not cheesing this punishment by not playing for 30 days.  i dont think this too strict. your offenses reset every 45 days.

Wouldn’t it be a really easy system to abuse for boosting? Imagine that you have taken down 3 inhibs + baron, then, your new « friend » suddenly leavers the game for a few minutes and you get 40 LP because he wasn’t present for 2 minutes.

The idea is good, but you can’t trust people with it.
It happened again, this time with a Mundo against their Riven. Why is my account flagged for ragequitters all of a sudden?

Honestly, I think the "fair" thing would be taking whatever Riven would have been rewarded with (any xp and LP) and divided equally between the four players.

I honestly thought my idea was great, but Riot will never implement: If the team lost, the four players get a loss prevented and the Riven losses LP as if they lost five consecutive games. They say it's bad if you have to leave for an emergency, but the way I see it, if it really was an emergency, you'd be lucky if the LP loss was the worst thing that happens to you.

I play league for fun and to decompress from the stresses of real life like many other people. The last thing someone who had an actual emergency needs is to login to their stress relief game only to find out they've been punished with 5 games worth of LP loss. Yeah it may not be as big a deal as whatever happened in real life but why should a video game add to it? Riot wants to RETAIN players, not lose them. I understand you take this game seriously and dislike having an AFK on your team but you're being exessive.

Seeing as I had a comment that was less rude than that taken down within minutes of me posting it, I am really tempted to report this.

> Then you shouldn't have said it.

There is a point though. There should be a harsher penalty in terms of LP if you leave and make the game needlessly tougher for your team.

> Current system is fair enough. You lose LP regardless of game outcome and get leaver bustered into low priority que which can lead to a ban if you do it regularly.

But said system does nothing to ensure the people who have leavers are taken care of.
If someone gets knocked off the highway by a reckless driver, they don't just arrest said driver. They also send an ambulance and a squadron of firefighters to ensure everyone is safe too. Riot's system is just arresting the reckless driver and leaving the victims to rot.
Another problem is that accounts aren't that hard to make. You get a ban, you can make a new account, level it up, and boom, you're now free to ragequit ranked games again. Not hard.
That said, a ban doesn't mean much, especially in low elos.
No because that would just encourage flaming towards teammates that are doing poorly.
